CustomField.description: ************** Formula must be updated when Business Unit SE is modified with new picklist values!
CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE((IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit_SE__c , "BVS" ), "BSV;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit_SE__c , "BA" ), "BA;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit_SE__c , "BVS" ), "BVS;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit_SE__c , "DPS" ), "DPS;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit_SE__c , "Advisory Services" ), "Advisory Services;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit_SE__c , "North" ), "North;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit_SE__c , "West" ), "West;",null ) & "#"), ";#",""),"#","-")
CustomField.label: Busines Unit SE Snapshot
